name: aharper
cooked: Simply put, yes. There should be a self eval and cert program, but it simply cannot be ascribed the same gravitas that an independent review and certification would have. Consider safety. If you bought a toaster that the manufacturer said was safe, would this guarantee be comparable to UL listing? Again with the spectrum.
raw: Simply put, yes.  There should be a self eval and cert program, but it simply cannot be ascribed the same gravitas that an independent review and certification would have.  Consider safety.  If you bought a toaster that the manufacturer said was safe, would this guarantee be comparable to UL listing?  Again with the spectrum.
